metadata.title: CVE-2019-8690 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A logic issue existed in the handling of document loads. This issue wasaddressed with improved state management. This issue is fixed in iOS 12.4,macOS Mojave 10.14.6, tvOS 12.4, Safari 12.1.2, iTunes for Windows 12.9.6,iCloud for Windows 7.13, iCloud for Windows 10.6. Processing maliciouslycrafted web content may lead to universal cross site scripting.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
